cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
The Mazda Miata will get you zooming with only 11000 miles on it. The interior is custom animal print.
Like new! With only 420 miles on it, this car feels like a cloud in heaven to drive. Keep in control with manual transmission and hand crank windows.
